item.title: HOW TO: Install Jenkins-CI on a Mac OS X with Git - Bitbucket
item.description: A few notes on getting Jenkins-CI installed on your Mac and setup with Git and Bitbucket for source code management.

item.title: HOW TO Install Selenium 2 for Mac OS X / Python
item.description: If you own a Mac and want to get started with Selenium for Automated Testing of your web apps, then you're already most of the way there.

item.title: Web server performance - usage and load
item.description: Web Application Development can seem easy if you're used to a shared host and WordPress running out of the box.

item.title: HOW TO fix the Fatal Error: Allowed Memory Size in WordPress
item.description: WordPress offers lots of plugins to choose from and if you add to many you will soon come across this Fatal Error message.

item.title: HOWTO: Fix no mobile internet after Cyanogenmod install
item.description: Here's a simple fix to problems of no Mobile Internet after installing Cyanogenmod rom on your Android.

item.title: Slideshare Featured presentation of the day – get started with Foursquare
item.description: Here's my newest Guide to getting started with Foursquare and it was selected by Slideshare as featured presentation on their homepage and on their business marketing section.
